means: 具有相似意向或目的的

sentence.Network_en: I appeal to all like-minded people to support me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我呼吁所有志同道合的人来支持我。

sentence.Network_en: Never underestimate what you can learn from a group of like-minded people.
sentence.Network_cn: 千万不要低估你从一群志趣相投的人那里所能学到的东西。

sentence.Network_en: I have complained to my MP, and urge all, like - minded ` people to do the same.
sentence.Network_cn: 我已向议员提出不满的意见, 并努力敦促抱有共识的人采取同样行动.

hope to have more like-minded friends同时也希望生活中志趣相投的朋友多多

PerfectNetExp.exp: 意思是想法和目标相同的
PerfectNetExp.abs: 听力教程第21... ... dry up。 Dry up, 意思是耗尽，用光。今年年初开始的阿拉 Like-minded。 Like-minded, 意思是想法和目标相同的。.

list.abs: mind like a sharp sword , which can allow you to cut off the front of the thorns , also-gill your soul .心态像利剑，它可以让你砍断前方的荆棘，又可以反刺你的心灵。

a baby enters the world with a mind like blank paper and gradually he or she acquires the to think , to talk and finally to communicate easily . isn't there something magical about it ?一个婴儿来到人世，其头脑就像一张白纸，渐渐地，他（她)能思考了，能说话了，最后，能与人不费力气地交流了，这难道不是很神奇吗？
these days my frame of mind likes this young girl ., 这几天我的心就像这少女.
I appeal to all , like minded' people to support me .我请求有这类想法的人都来支持我。
stand by each other because they are of like mind ., 因为他们有相同的想法 , 所以站在了一起.

entry.tran: 想法相同的；志趣相投的
entry.def: Like-minded people have similar opinions, ideas, attitudes, or interests.

example.ex: ...the opportunity to mix with hundreds of like-minded people.
example.tran: 与许许多多志趣相投的人交流的机会

means.word_mean: 1. of the same turn of mind

auth_sentence.content: It captures a wonderful sonic conversation between like-minded souls.
